Property.Description: Remote file/directory to be downloaded. Directory not supported for HTTP(S). Not required for TFS, CVS, SVN

Property.name: /target/target_files_dirs

Property.name: /target/overwrite_target
Property.Description: Overwrite local files/directory if exist. For SVN, all files will be exported but already present files will not be overwritten. For TFS, overwrites all items in the workspace(CLI: /force)

Property.name: /source/tfs/util_path
Property.Description: Path to the tf.exe utility which will be used to communicate with Team Foundation Server. If no path was specified, the default value (C:/Program Files/Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0/Common7/IDE/Tf) will be assumed.

Property.name: /source/tfs/item
Property.Description: File or folder to retrieve. If no itemspec is provided, Team Foundation Server performs a recursive get operation of the current workspace. For ex: $/Project/

Property.name: /source/tfs/version
Property.Description: Optional version specification. The versionspec is the version of the item you want to retrieve. You can specify a version by: Date/time (D10/20/2005), Changeset version (C1256), Label (Lmylabel), Latest version (T), Workspace version (Workspacename;owner). If no version is provided, Team Foundation Server retrieves the latest server version of the specified itemspec into your workspace.

Property.name: /source/tfs/retrieve_all
Property.Description: Replace the file on disk, even if the workspace version is the same as the requested server version. Used when "Overwrite files" option is set to NO.(CLI option /all)

Property.name: /source/tfs/overwrite
Property.Description: Forcibly overwrite the writable current workspace version with a specified server version. Used only when "Overwrite files" option is set to NO.(CLI option /overwrite)

Property.name: /source/tfs/recursive
Property.Description: Recursively retrieves all items that match your itemspec.
